name: Mermaid Adventures: The Frozen Time
description: Help Alice and her friends bring peace and sanity back to the underwater kingdom in this gorgeous Match-3 adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/Win7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: sb16
